website_summaries.verdict: For those who are serious Fingerling enthusiasts or kids who have their hearts set on the interactive toys, this is an incredible choice.
pros: Two Fingerling Monkeys – Willy and Milly – plus a crank-operated seesaw playset for hanging and swinging make this pick highly interactive and action-packed

customer_reviews.title: Dammmm adorable
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute pets. Purchased this for my daughter and I am playing with it more than her 😂😂😂 just loving the movements by this fingerlings monkeys 🐒.
customer_reviews.author: CharziCorner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with one issue though
customer_reviews.text: These monkeys are super fun but the seesaw is pretty useless. My daughters love playing with monkeys. They make various kind of noices depending on how you interact with them. See saw comes undone easily and is no fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Ratings Man

customer_reviews.title: Simple fun toy
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure if my kids would like this. they don't really play with the other two I gave them. but with the playset they play with this more. they enjoy the teeter-totter and making the fingerlings laugh and coo. great job.
customer_reviews.author: SliverSeven

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute! I bought 2 sets for each of my younger children. One boy and one girl. They both loved them and have been playing with them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: mamachilla

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were all my 6 year old wanted for Christmas. She was super excited to open the package but doesn’t play with it very often. I’ve only seen her hold them twice. I think she expected them to do more because of the commercial. I wouldn’t buy them again for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These little monkeys are so darn cute! My little one just loves this playset. I got a great deal on these and the fact that the set comes with TWO monkeys is a real bonus. Hours of fun with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ CRAZY

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday gift! Shipping was fast I think my niece is gonna love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rysmomma3

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are cute inexpensive gifts for little ones. They are fun, and little kids seem to enjoy them especially when they have more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Wee love Fingerlings , when I came across this one with 2 fingerlings toy set , grabbed it !! And its so much Fun . My LO loves playing with this one and the Fingerlings are so cute . Can spend hours playing , so would def recommend this set . And this is a genuine Fingerling toy and not a dupe item
customer_reviews.author: Rumna Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for your kids
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases for my daughter. She loved it. It’s cute and strong so that it doesn’t break off easily. Fingerlings are battery operated and reacts to sound. Cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Lokendar

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The packaging needs to be undone by an adult and even then it's long and tedious. Child gets antsy. But product very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Will probably break easily.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter. A little flimsy and will probably break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece is going to love this. My children have them and love them. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Langford

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids. My daughter enjoys playing with this. Even my wife plays with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nk

customer_reviews.title: Simply loved this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would play with this all day and love this toy set 4 star because see saw is hard to move up and down and need additional pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got the best deal on this, and my kids love it! All around win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Cute for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I got an amazing price for these. My son loves the monkeys. They whistle and make sounds.
customer_reviews.author: MsKrystaBelle

customer_reviews.title: good idea but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good but the product is not robust. The links are weak and not reinforced so when we rotate it the links keep coming out.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Cute but would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them but they unfortunately already stopped working. The swing that came with it is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very cool toy
customer_reviews.text: From my 7 year old daughter: I love this toy because of the cute sounds that the monkeys make. From the daddy: Both of my kids really loved the toy. They can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: I was the best grandmother in the know
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I was the best grandmother in the know.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: They talk 😍
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo love these fingerlings, she picked this out online it was bigger than we thought and great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to move this but the seesaw would not stay attached. I kept having to reattach it for my child very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Angela Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter. It pleased her, but it comes apart easily when she plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Myers

customer_reviews.title: Daughters had a good time with talking monkeys
customer_reviews.text: Daughters had a good time with talking monkeys. Instructions could be better in explaining different things that the monkey can do.
customer_reviews.author: Satya

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a pretty big box. My son enjoys the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute playset! My 5 yr old loves this! The monkeys seems to interact with each other and she finds it totally hilarious. This product has nice packaging and was a lot larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: CassieLSpanke

customer_reviews.title: better than buying two fingerlings individually.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, better than buying two fingerlings individually.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Cute monkeys but the seesaw are bad
customer_reviews.text: The monkeys are so cute! I love them and like to play them with my daughter! Not sure if I didn't use the right gesture for sleep, the monkeys don't give me the right reaction in most cases. But this is not a problem for me since anyway they are cute! The problem is the seesaw, it is easy to install but also easy to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and a good deal because you get 2 of the monkeys with it but it broke within 24 hours. Even before the piece snapped in half, I had to reassemble this at least 10 times because it kept coming apart. If your children are even a little bit rough with their toys, I highly recommend staying away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas so these are actually still in the boxes, but my kids loooooved the individual monkeys last year so I thought a playground would be great! And two extra monkeys is icing on the cake. Amazing prime day deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Bethay

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 & 7 year old love these! They are cute and fun to play with. The see saw is kinda flimsy and the end comes off the notch easy but it pops back on.
customer_reviews.author: kms0904

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest monkeys. I bought a set for my 13 year old nephew AND my 11 month old, and they both loved them. So it works for a variety of ages
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Got these on prime day cause they were cheap. They’re cute but definitely not worth the full/regular price
customer_reviews.author: sarah2134

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!!We already have a fingerlings baby unicorn, and my daughter likes it. This time I purchased it was a bday gift for my daughter. It’s well made,My daughter has been enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Prime day steal
customer_reviews.text: Got these on prime day for a steal of a price! Very happy kids!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Allen

customer_reviews.title: Tough packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Twist tie packaging inside the plastic is always annoying but toy works great. Kid likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The monkeys are very cute, my daughter likes see-saws but this one is very wobbly. I have to make sure I stabilize it for my daughter to spin the handle. When she does it on her own, the middle section comes undone. Overall very cute, just wish it was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on sale and was very surprised by the quality. My nieces will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WowWee Fingerlings Playset – See-Saw with 2 Baby Monkey Toys, “Willy” (Blue) and “Milly” (Purple)
product_meta.description: Willy and Milly are pretty silly – they never know if they’re up or if they’re down, but they both love to monkey around on their colorful teeter totter! Milly is a lilac purple monkey with blue hair, while Willy is a pastel blue monkey with purple hair. This inseparable pair are exclusively available with this Fingerlings play set. You control the the see-saw action by turning the crank, while your Fingerlings remain safely seated on a teeter totter that is specially designed for their curly tails. Your little monkeys will also have fun taking turns hanging upside down and playing with your other little pets in their purple, pink, yellow, and blue play set. Like all Fingerlings Baby Monkeys, Milly and Willy also love to interact with you - responding to your touch, sounds, and movement. These friendly pets are happy to go wherever you go and will make you laugh with their cute monkey babble and giggles, adorable blinking eyes, and head turns.
feature_bullets: Fingerlings Baby Monkeys Milly and Willy love to play together on their see-saw play set
Place them on the teeter totter or hang one upside down by its tail
You control the see-saw action by turning the crank
Milly is a purple monkey with blue hair and Willy is a blue monkey with purple hair - both exclusively available with this play set
Fingerlings Baby Monkey batteries are included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
